title: Spectrum: We are all living on a volcano
description: What's it like living next to a shaking, spewing volcano? And what can Hawaiians do about it? Also, we go inside the caldera of a German volcano that erupted with such violence that it stopped the River Rhine entirely.
itunes:author: DW.COM | Deutsche Welle
itunes:keywords: Podcast, Wissenschaft, Vulkan, Hawaii, Kilauea, Eifel, Maria Laach
